dialogues.text: You find yourself standing in front of a old mansion. The once grand house now stands as a testament to the ravages of time.

dialogues.speaker: Butler
dialogues.text: Welcome, you must be here for the reading of the will. Please, come in.
You enter the mansion and notice a sense of unease in the air. The butler leads you to a room where several people are gathered.

dialogues.speaker: Lawyer
dialogues.text: Ladies and gentlemen, we are here today to read the will of the late Mr. Smith. I must warn you, the contents may come as a shock to some of you.
